text:
What harm in endorsing #chloroquine for #covid? 
"It can kill you if you take too much...take it for a long time in high doses, it can damage the eyes & the muscles...countries recommending it [like] #India are making a mistake, @TropMedOxford's Nick White https://t.co/j4e0jTQOy7 https://t.co/yWb226ZcRj
